about_the_game: Experience the music of West Weald with The Elder Scrolls Online: Gold Road Official Soundtrack. In ESO’s Gold Road Chapter, you can discover a once-abundant Imperial region beset by the chaos of the Forgotten Prince. Now, you can enjoy the sounds of the West Weald zone and storyline anywhere you go with a selection of melodies taken from this new adventure.
detailed_description: Experience the music of West Weald with The Elder Scrolls Online: Gold Road Official Soundtrack.
